In bridge there are 35 possible contracts (7 * 5), which can be doubled or redoubled, and partnerships can make anywhere from 0-13 tricks. This results in 7 (levels) * 5 (strains) * 3 (X, XX or neither) * 13 (tricks made) * 2 (vulnerability) * 2 (your partnership or theirs) = 5,460 possible different scores. There are only 204 unique scores however:
